ygData.subject: Re: Karana Lambent Trading
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yep, I have to agree.  I taught many people the power of bards charm last night.  My pet giant killed one giant and those troll guards, and then has a
ygData.messageBody:
>while killing hill giants to get lambent stones, my group
>was rather shocked to discover that killing two giants was
>actually easier than killing one, thanks to Solon's Song of
>the Sirens.

Yep, I have to agree. I taught many people the power of bards
charm last night. My pet giant killed one giant and those troll
guards, and then has a sliver of hp left, from which I chain/fear
him dead. All on my own. Now that's power.

Harmonic Distortion, 40th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
